sentence.Network_en: Relations between countries based on the fundaments of mutual respect and neighborliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 国与国之关系建立在相互的尊敬及和睦基础上.

sentence.Network_en: In its foreign relations , the Chinese nation has advocated cordiality , benevolence , good - neighborliness and universal harmony.
sentence.Network_cn: 中华民族在对外交往中,崇尚亲仁善邻, 主张和而不同, 追求普遍和谐.

sentence.Network_en: We value community, the neighborliness that expresses itself through raising the barn or coaching the team.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们重视社区, 通过建造谷仓或执教足球队所表现出的睦邻友好.
